N皇后问题

Feb 17, 2017

N皇后问题

n*n的棋盘不在同一行，列，撇，捺，的摆法

问题分析
  • 每行只有一个点
  • 遍历每行一个点的所有组合
  • 帅选出符合条件的组
function queen(layer) {
    var current = [], resulf = [];
    !function loop(row) {
      for (let col = 0; col < layer; col++) {
        current.length = row + 1;
        if (current.some((item) => {
            return item.mark[row + ',' + col] || item.mark["*," + col] || false
          })) {
          continue;
        }
        current[row] = {dot: row + ',' + col, mark: getMark(row, col)}
        if ((1 + row) < layer) {
          loop(row + 1)
        } else {
          resulf.push(current.map((item)=>{
            return item.dot
          }))
        }
      }
    }(0);
    return resulf;
    function getMark(row, col) {
      var mark = {},
        i = layer - row,
        y1 = row,
        x1 = col,
        y2 = row,
        x2 = col;
      mark["*," + col] = true;
      while (i--) {
        mark[`${y1++},${x1++}`] = true;
        mark[`${y2++},${x2--}`] = true;
      }
      return mark
    }
  }

  console.time('t1');
  log(queen(4));
  console.timeEnd("t1");
